name: Flat Earth
description:
Play with Gamepads. Commands assume Xbox 360 / one controller is used.

Supports up to 4 players with drop-in functionality.
A = Dash
B = Attack
X = Block

View/Select button will skip cinematic. 
Start/Menu button will progress between maps and spawn in players when in the lobby. 

Collect coins and push players off the edge to earn points. Destroy the fly by nyan cats for bonus points.

Press Esc to close the game.
